q: Capitol Hill.( Mr. President Bush had at this point moved to the front row of the audience.) Mr. Dick Cheney 's recollection prompted Mr. Colin Powell to recall his own arguments with Mr. Dick Cheney . There were occasional moments when he thought I was off the farm, Mr. Colin Powell said of Mr. Dick Cheney , who as defense secretary was the civilian leader in charge of the military, including Mr. Colin Powell .`` I generally knew when I had stepped over the line and he quickly reminded

news comes as Google announced revenue for the three months to 31 December rose 26% to$ 8.44 bn, driven by gains from display and mobile advertising revenue. Eric Schmidt says of the quarterly results: Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. Net profit in the fourth quarter was$ 2.54 bn, up from$ 1.97 bn in the same period last year.

editors at the News of the World knew that phone hacking was taking place. The accusations put Andy Coulson back into the spotlight. His resignation Friday came as little surprise to many political observers. Continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role.... When a spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on, Andy Coulson said in a statement, adding that he would leave the job in a few weeks. Representatives care only about party line To the Editor: Quotes from Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand and Barack Obama Chuck Schumer :`` It is time to come together and work to create jobs across America'' and He is aware of the need to grow jobs, the economy and middle class paychecks. That stuff is all good. Congress passed a bill related to the H-2A program to help farmers trying to make it easier for migrant workers. You might ask,`` How is it working?''

Idol colleague Simon Cowell is`` obsessed'' with her. The Live To Dance judge was asked during an appearance on NBC's recent admission that he is a`` massive fan'' of hers. I think you need to take` mass' off and put` obsess'[ there instead], she laughed.`` He's obsessed with me!'' He missed four recent games with a sore knee, but played 32 minutes against the Kings in his second game back, making 6-of-14 shots and adding five rebounds, three assists and three steals. All my life I've been watching him play and to have the opportunity to play him was fun, said Kings guard Sergio Rodriguez, who was matched up against Allen Iverson at times.`` He showed that he can still play and he can play well. ... It just[ felt] negative.'' The` Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added,`` I will say that it's a kinder, gentler[ show now.]''

reproductive rights advocates. They have appropriated the Republican charge from last year that Democrats were working on a liberal policy agenda instead of on job creation and the economy, and turned it on its head. This election was about the economy, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand of New York, who joined with other Democratic senators Tuesday to decry the House bills Tuesday as needless and intrusive.
